column1: The '''Hills of Scary''' was a small range of hills in the northern part of the [[Eastfarthing]] in [[the Shire]]
column3: from which they took their name.<ref>{{FR|Part}}</ref>  During the [[War of the Ring]] a band of rebel [[Hobbits]]
column5: had hidden in the [[Brockenbores]] near the Hills of Scary until the [[Ruffians]] smoked them out.<ref>{{RK|Havens}}</ref>
